text: Andriy Leonidovych Husin (; 11 December 1972 â€“ 17 September 2014) was a professional Ukrainian football player and coach. He played in the Ukraine national football team. He was one of Ukraine's most capped players. He was a member of Ukraine's 2006 World Cup Squad, and played several games in the 2006 World Cup. Husin was killed in a motorcycle crash in Kyiv on 17 September 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1972 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:Sportspeople from Kyiv
title: Andriy Husin
